title: FundedNext Futures Check website
description: FundedNext Futures, based in the United Arab Emirates and established in April 2025, is a futures firm offering a 1 Step program. The firm supports trading via Tradovate, TradingView, and NinjaTrader. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
forbidden_strategies: Account Rolling: Using multiple challenge accounts with reckless intent.
Multi-Order Spam and Coordinated Trading Exploits (DOM manipulation).
Account Flipping and Inconsistent Contract Execution (high margin reckless positions).

payout_policy.details: 80% split. Legacy: Min 5 benchmark days, 50% max withdrawal before 30 days. Rapid: No benchmark, cap removed after 5 rewards. Bolt: Max withdrawal $1200, 5 total payouts max.

firm_rules.copy_trading: Allowed for mirroring own trades only.
firm_rules.news_trading: Allowed, but 2% Price Limit Rule applies (CME price limit).
forbidden_strategies: Account Rolling: Using multiple challenge accounts with reckless intent.
Multi-Order Spam and Coordinated Trading Exploits (DOM manipulation).
Account Flipping and Inconsistent Contract Execution (high margin reckless positions).

seo_content:
FundedNext Futures Technical Infrastructure

FundedNext Futures, based in the United Arab Emirates and established in April 2025, is a futures firm offering a 1 Step program. The firm supports trading via Tradovate, TradingView, and NinjaTrader. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
